website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung BD-D6700 is an excellent all-around Blu-ray player with dual HDMI outputs, but for most buyers its upgrades won't justify its high price.
pros: The Samsung BD-D6700 sports dual HDMI outputs, built-in Wi-Fi, and one of the most extensive suites of streaming video services in comparable Blu-ray players this year, including Netflix, Hulu Plus, MLB.TV, Vudu and CinemaNow
Its 1GB of onboard memory is also more than you get in most of the competition
cons: It's tough to justify the BD-D6700's high price, especially with the Sony PS3 being available for only slightly more
And while the dual HDMI outputs are nice, most buyers that need them will be just as satisfied with a player with a single HDMI output and using the optical output for audio

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this player
customer_reviews.text: While very sleek and attractive, this product is full of bugs. It freezes about 10% of the time with discs and 50% of the time with Netflix. Samsung has never made a Bluray player that works well with Netflix streaming and even admits it. It is now July 2013 and the whole unit just crashed. I turns on and off by itself and won't even play discs anymore. Do not buy this product--- or any Samsung bluray players. On the other hand, I love their tvs and have 2 that work beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bowles

customer_reviews.title: but it is still working great! I love the USB port on it
customer_reviews.text: I honestly bought this several years ago, but it is still working great! I love the USB port on it. I have several of my favorite movies I stored on an external hard drive, and I can just plug that in to this Blu-ray player and watch them straight off my hard drive!
customer_reviews.author: Ardera

customer_reviews.title: Plays region-free discs
customer_reviews.text: This has worked beautifully from day one. I've had it over a year without any issues. I would rate it 4.5 because I'd prefer to have more internet-available options (such as Amazon Prime videos, for example, rather than only Netflix). But that's a software issue, not hardware. For the hardware, this thing is sleek, silent and sensational. And Region-Free Blu-Ray discs play perfectly, which is really a nice feature. I'm not "locked in" to only one region if I get overseas Blu-Rays as long as they're region-free. The closest competitor would be an Oppo (at a MUCH more expensive price).
customer_reviews.author: furryone

customer_reviews.title: Nice if it works
customer_reviews.text: We've had the device for about 6 months. Initially it worked fine but after about 5 months we started to experience frequent rebuffering when watching streamed content. After much researching with NETFLIX, etc. it turned out that the electronics in the device must have degraded. It is not a WIFI issue, the rebuffering also happens when plugged in. We have fast broadband. We will try to get a replacement. The remote control is not really cleverly designed, the confirm button is flush with the cursor buttons and therefore hard to find in the dark. Other than that: looks very nice and the system is easy to use overall.
customer_reviews.author: Heiner

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review to let people know that it seems as though Samsung is making their machines to fail just past warranty. Just over a year and this machine has failed. This in itself wasn't so bad except that it follows the failure of a 6900 Samsung. Also just over a year old. Upon researching DVD's it seems from other reviews that this is the rule rather than the exception. From what I can read most customers are turning back to Sony which is what I have done. It's on order so wish me luck. Samsung has lost this customer forever !
customer_reviews.author: Tommy L. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Flaky POS that has made me suspicious of Samsung ever since.
customer_reviews.text: Flaky POS. Hangs if you try to eject the disc while it is loading. Used to want to update firmware all the time. Internet, file access, apps all flaky. Netflix never worked well. God forbid if your amp is set to this connection; will automatically switch the TV to the amp even though you haven't touched the blu ray player (and it was off), and just want to switch the TV back to cable. I guess they thought the player would be "helpful", but these kinds of things make you wonder what set of monkeys wrote the firmware for it. Luckily it still plays BDs reasonably well.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen

customer_reviews.title: Update turns it into a brick
customer_reviews.text: If you update the player it will turn it into a brick. It goes into "load" mode and will not accept a disc or do anything else. Every other feature of the player (settings, "Smart" hub, you name it) also dies. All that remains is the sound of money being sucked out of your wallet. There is no fix for this problem other than sending it in for repair for $100+. Note the reviews of the updated version of this player and you will see that this problem persists. Don't buy this one or that one. If you can't help yourself, then don't perform any of the updates unless you're in the market for a very expensive paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Max Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Connected to the Samsung TV Without any issues! Itlways works and is silent. Great picture and sound. No issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: El Pescador

customer_reviews.title: Love the player
customer_reviews.text: Love this player. Had to find one that broke . Newer version of remote is super cheap
customer_reviews.author: Robert J

customer_reviews.title: Samsung BD-D6500 Blu Ray Disc Player ....=)
customer_reviews.text: Well for a basic BR-3D player- really it does the job. I like the slot loading that's a plus. Other options I don't care about because my LG-55 in LCD-3D smart TV has those other options. Buy this used or in refurbished condition w/ remote you have a Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: irishjohnny577

customer_reviews.title: Poor product, poor warranty service
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple of weeks use, the player refused to eject a disk. The player has no manual eject hole, so sending the player in for service was the only option. However, the cost of return shipping combined with cost of the lost disk approached the cost of the player. Rather than paying shipping charges and waiting, I pulled the player apart to retrieve the disk. The disk appeared undamaged and I can't imagine why it would not eject. This player has a poor design and Sumsung provides unacceptably poor service. As you can probably guess, the replacement player will not be a Samsung. I've learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: T. Parker

customer_reviews.title: QUICK START, GREAT 3D OUTPUT, GREAT DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: This BD player starts a blu-ray in 10 to 15 sec (in comparison to my first BD player I bought in 2008: SOny BDP 550, which used to take forever to start). This has a slim design and built in smart hub. I have not really used the smart hub all that much as I have other devices for netflix, youtube etc with better UI than what samsung offers. All in all, it is a very good BD player and I have had no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: ILuvShopping

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We tried two other, much more expensive, 3-D/Bluray players that gave us a lot of trouble. One wouldn't play most of our Blurays and the other was extremely slow to read discs and shut off and did not show on the machine or the screen how far into the movie you were. We have not had any problems with the design or operation of this machine, which does have a lighted read out on the player when it is on, gives information about minutes in and left on the screen when pause is pushed, and reacts pretty quickly to commands (on/off, reading disc, etc.). We will be getting another.
customer_reviews.author: alphabet shopper

customer_reviews.title: An OK unit
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 identical units to pair up as wi-fi devices for my Samsung LCD TVs. Pros: the unit communicates with my Samsung TV. TV turns on when I insert a dvd into the player or when I turn the player on. It adjust screen size to match best TV setting. The remote has a NETFLIX button...nice bonus. Very slim unit. Cons: One of the two units had to be sent back for repairs after a few months because it stopped connecting to my router. You can't eject a DvD unless the unit is turned on. Touch Controls on the unit are difficult to see.
customer_reviews.author: jungleno

customer_reviews.title: apps aren't working right
customer_reviews.text: picture is fine works as well as any other samsung's i've purchased, but netflix keeps saying not connected to the internet , which is a issue I got three of them and they all do the same thing, even after all the updates resetting the apps, hardwire and wireless doesn't matter, might have to return them if I can't get some sort of resolution
customer_reviews.author: Jason P. Loveless

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had this a little over one year and it took a dump. Of course it was not covered by Amazon or Samsung since it was past the year warranty. Took it to a repair facility and would have cost twice what I paid for it. Not likely to buy Samsung DVD player again.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Samsung BD-D6500 3D Blu-ray Player
customer_reviews.text: The player was promptly shipped. It would not read or play any type of disc even after an update. Contacted Amazon and within 27 hours a new identical player was on my desk. It worked perfectly. Great player and Amazon is a great company with which to do business. The player is very sleek and takes up little room. Much faster than my first generation Samsung player.
customer_reviews.author: Chief Knight

customer_reviews.title: Fine Blue-ray Player!
customer_reviews.text: Flawless all round! Cool looks, fantastic performance! Internet services linked to this DVD player are very good indeed. Works seamlessly with my Sony Internet TV and software linked with the Google TV automatically. It's so integrated all you do is put in a disk and the TV knows what to do from there with no input from the viewer.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Lane

customer_reviews.title: great player for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was my second samsung blu ray player, and it meets all of my expectations. No problems at all in connecting, accessing internet, adding my apps, oh and fantastic picture on the dvd playback. Have not had a chance to try out the 3d features yet, but all systems are working flawlessly and I am quite happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: MarciaM

customer_reviews.title: T.H.I.E.V.E.S.
customer_reviews.text: T.H.E.Y. S.C.A.M.E.D. M.E. A.N.D. L.O.S.T. M.Y. B.L.U. R.A.Y. I D.O. N.O.T. R.E.C.O.M.M.E.N.D. T.H.E.M, A.R.E. T.H.I.E.V.E.S. A.N.D. D.O. N.O.T. R.E.T.U.R.N. M.O.N.E.Y.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Never used, already broken
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the WORST quality blu-ray player in the world! I just pulled this out of the box last night and tonight, decided to get all my settings set. The built-in wireless doesn't work and wont connect to the net! After calling Samsung they are telling me I have to send in my BRAND NEW unit to be repaired because it's broken/defective! You shouldn't have to be sending in a brand new, never used player to be fixed like that. Poor quality. I'm sure glad I didn't get one of their TV's now!
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod Propeck

customer_reviews.title: Does't have an Amazon App!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up, but I was very surprised that it does not have the capability to stream Amazon videos. Since I am a Prime Amazon customer, I am thinking of returning this blu ray player since my other LG blu ray player does have an Amazon app to stream movies and TV shows.
customer_reviews.author: MartyB

customer_reviews.title: Just Really, Really Slow
customer_reviews.text: It's great---colors, sound, setup, number of features---but it's really, really slow switching between things like Netflix and Pandora. Netflix in particular takes some time to exit, enter, and to have dvd images load. Just as a point of reference I'm coming off of a WD Live TV. Got it for $50 which is a lot less than this thing is worth and it moves at at least 2 as fast. Pretty disappointing in that respect. If you but this thing, just remember that the power button is your friend. It's really easier to just shut down and restart rather than try to exit netflix and other things that take forever.
customer_reviews.author: MacBookPro2011

customer_reviews.title: Netflix connection not working
customer_reviews.text: Netflix connection is not working. I called Netflix and they told me that the latest firmward update on this unit (Samsung BD-D6500) has issues.
customer_reviews.author: Manoj Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Very good 3D blue-ray player.
customer_reviews.text: This 3D Blue-ray player mates perfectly with my Samsung HDTV. When you insert a disk into the player the HDTV turns on automatically and source shifts to HDMI2 (my Blue-ray) setting. Also this Player gives me access to online content ie. Netflix etc. a good feature since my bargain basement Samsung HDTV has no frills. So Far no problems. It works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: There is likely a better choice.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a year and won't play Bluray's anymore. A little noisy when it is playing. There is likely a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: J&C

customer_reviews.title: Netflix Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Samsung must have fixed their connectivity problems because I received the unit in mid June 2011 and hooked it up to my secure wireless router with no problems. Amazingly, Netflix streaming video comes through the wireless connection just fine. The DVD and blu ray playback is great and disks load quickly. I have a 720 plasma so I cannot see any video difference between this unit and other lower cost units. The Netflix interface is OK but the Pansonic Vieracast interface is better.
customer_reviews.author: Hacker

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this one
customer_reviews.text: The description for this product says it will "up-convert 2D to 3D." It will not. Dealing with tech support was not at all pleasant. I was finally able to figure out (reading reviews all over the I-net) that the BD-D6700 did, in fact, include this feature. I returned the 6500 to Amazon and purchased the 6700. By the way, Amazon.com's personnel are the greatest people to deal with. For years I never had a problem with a purchase, so never had to return anything. My recent purchase of a 3D TV (damaged in shipping) and a couple of DVD players that had problems allowed me to discover how stress-less an otherwise bad experience can be.
customer_reviews.author: teacherjoe

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, have used this 3d player for over 2 years, simple interface user friendly. The player is connected to the internet by wifi with smart apps, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lbt

customer_reviews.title: awesome player
customer_reviews.text: super easy to install on our wifi. hookup to netflix was also simple. It's too bad that there isn't a link to regular Hulu (just Hulu plus), but otherwise the apps seem fine. Blu ray and DVD playback is excellent and the player loads quickly. Haven't tried the 3D option.
customer_reviews.author: hubedo

customer_reviews.title: Same as the D6700, except one HD Output
customer_reviews.text: The player has one HD output, which is what I need for my HD TV. Very slim, very attractive device. The slot loading mechanism is faster than my Sony's tray on my other player.
customer_reviews.author: NoBull

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 5 year old Samsung unit that had trouble playing the newer Blu-ray discs. It played even the most recently issued disks flawlessly, and loaded them in very quickly also. No problems with the unit, set-up was very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Sleak and cool.
customer_reviews.text: I'm Enjoying this thing got it at a good price using it to stream from my pc, server and tablet Blu-ray awesome can not complain.
customer_reviews.author: CJANY

customer_reviews.title: Fair to middlin'
customer_reviews.text: Setting it up & using it was very easy & the Blu-ray worked very well. After awhile, I could not connect to the internet with it. I read reviews that stated the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: John Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Great Blu-ray player
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for us since it was purchased, and we have not had any issues with the player.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Good for what I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.text: Plays .avi .mp3 .mp4 files either on a cd,dvd or usb drive. Plays my old store bought cd's too. Has a shuffle option for playing music files.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm very pleased with this player. There were some negative reviews but they have proven false for me and in the long run the set up was easy to do. There were some updates that loaded automatically after initial set up and several since then. I am very happy with it's performance . There are many apps to learn, but that's just because this player has so much to offer. The only app I miss is for Amazon instant video. Hopefully this app will be added soon.
customer_reviews.author: miked

customer_reviews.title: Bruno Soares
customer_reviews.text: The blu-ray design is really modern. The customer service is very good. Whenever I sent them an e-mail, they would reply to it with an hour or two, even though they say it would take 24 to 48 hours for them to get back you. Very corteous service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: internet very slow
customer_reviews.text: I got this Blu-ray because it was Samsung and I use a lot of their products without any problems. This Blu-ray however has given me a lot of problems. It's very noisy when playing a disc and half of the time it will eject a disc for no reason and it has to be reinserted before it will play it. The internet is extremely slow and every other time I use it, it says it needs updates and then I have to wait for half an hour to do that before I can use it. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M Fife

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Will buy again !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice DVD player with awesome features. It was easy to set up. Love the quality and fits perfectly because it is slim. I had am LG before which did not last too long and I had to return it. Love this one!
customer_reviews.author: Gueorgui

customer_reviews.title: Samsung BD-D6500 3D Blu-ray Disc Player (Black) [2011 MODEL] (2011 Model)
customer_reviews.text: It is what I needed to play my Blu Ray movies. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Towles

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang For the Buck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to update my old blu-ray that did not have wifi. I use this to stream and watch dvds and blu-ray. IT WORKS GREAT. Its small, sharp looking and faster than my old player. Streaming movies from netflix is better than other models i've used. I am very happy with this product and I do recommend it. I have not use the 3D feature because I dont have a 3D tv yet. I'm sure there are better players out there but i was looking to spend less than $150 and ended up with this one, and very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Good Investment!
customer_reviews.text: I 've had well over a year maybe two. Works great. Never had a problem. Love the slide in disc part, rather than having a drawer that slides out.
customer_reviews.author: linglewoman

customer_reviews.title: Another Winner From Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Have enjoyed this player since buying it. Performs well and quietly,have had no problems at all with it.
customer_reviews.author: 9C-Z

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy any Samsung DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: There are so many known issues for Samsung DVD players with issues in regards to firmware and updates not working. I purchased this device and it currently is sitting on the load screen and will not navigate to anything else, inserting a DVD will also not work. The recommend is to send the device in for servicing. The cost in labor and shipping is the cost for the device in the first place. I will never purchase a Samsung DVD player again.
customer_reviews.author: rumschaker

customer_reviews.title: One minor user problem
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The only problem I had was trying to put in a disc for the 1st time. I kept hitting eject and waiting for a tray to open and appear. It never did. There is a slot for the disc and it is not really distinguishable. So only problem was I'm a guy, didn't read directions and couldn't figure out how to load disc. Other than than a great player.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Would Purchase Samsung Again
customer_reviews.text: Have had this a few years now and it still works great and as advertised. Can't expect more than that.
customer_reviews.author: CrittTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Netflix won't connect
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this player if you love Netflix because it doesn't work. It will connect to everything except for Netflix. I just unhooked this player up and hooked up my old bluray player and netflix works on that so there's nothing wrong with netflix and there's nothing wrong with my internet connection.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M. Cundiff

customer_reviews.title: Samsung bluray player
customer_reviews.text: What is it to say about Samsung, excellent product, great price. And have not had a problem with since I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Verry good.
customer_reviews.text: Verry good, so slim, have so much features like, Youtube, and another apps, change your TV like a near SMARTV.
customer_reviews.author: MasterDV

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product is pretty good although it is second-hand, I would like to know more about the store selling this equipment because it shows the quality of these
customer_reviews.author: David Guamán

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Turns itself on and off and on and off and on and off on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Happy Viewer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with set up, ease of operation,and the fact that we do not have to contend with a drawer that goes in and out for loading a dvd.
customer_reviews.author: Wise Ole Bird!

customer_reviews.title: Its a good player
customer_reviews.text: Great video, and sound quality. Plays most file formats with no problem including .mkv, and .ogg.Cons sometimes menu freezes, and player needs to be restarted. So im taking one star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Meister

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Samsung BD-D6500 Blu-ray. Set up was fast and easy, integrated quickly with my Samsung 50 inch TV and Pioneer receiver for excellent picture and sound quality through out my room. Power on and loading a disc are a bit slow but otherwise a nice mid level player.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Man gift
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a wonderful player. Very happy with this that was a gift for my husband for christmas. It does it all!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E B Ryckman

customer_reviews.title: Great decision
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play blue-ray discs and decided to go for the extra money and get one with internet capability. We've had Apple TV for a year and another internet device wasn't that necessary. Except that Apple TV can be temperamental and we'd been having connection and remote problems with it.(and I am an Apple person otherwise!) I installed this player and immediately was able to watch netflix without a hitch. No problems. Also I have a Samsung TV and the fact that they talk to each other" makes everything much easier. I like the interface and how smoothly it works with the TV. Oh, and it plays blue-ray discs too!
customer_reviews.author: A. John Banu

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: A good investment. I own two and after buying the first one I was convinced another one for a second tv was needed. Use it alot for Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3rd one seems to work......so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 3rd unit in about a month. Seems OK on the first disc. The first one didn't play a single disc and the second only managed one. On the plus side, the 3rd one seems to be just fine and plays very well. Fast loader too. Also worth noting is that this unit will play UK discs which was the main reason I got it (plus the wireless). If this unit breaks in the next few months I will never by another Samsung product again. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mister

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. this thing play everything I throw at it, amazing. The 3D movies are out of this world
customer_reviews.author: kstclaire69

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with our blu-ray
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought this blu-ray to replace one from Best Buy that growled from the day we installed it. The unit from Amazon works smoothly, and I'm looking forward to figuring out how to run Pandora through it, so we can have music as well as blu-ray and dvd playbacks. Very simple installation with the HDMI cable to my Samsung LED 46" TV, all from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lorne Truscott

customer_reviews.title: wireless
customer_reviews.text: okay. wireless range leaves much to be desired. the apps are painfully slow to watch loading. works great as blu ray player.
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: Blu-ray DVD player
customer_reviews.text: This is a great player for the money. It does everything I need it to do. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Blu-ray
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this Blu-ray because it allows my husband to listen with his earphones while I can still hear the audio from the TV. It works perfectly, and we also enjoy all the built in features such as Netflix.
customer_reviews.author: JWoods

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Set-up was extremely easy, nice sleek appearance, picture quality is excellent and the remote is very easy to navigate. If you are looking for an easy to use Blue Ray player with a great picture this is your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Pete M.

customer_reviews.title: Superb Player
customer_reviews.text: Excellent load time response, beautiful picture on all levels (DVD, B/D, 3D) Excellent Use of Apps. Buy without hesitation and here on Amazon for a truly great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: rstylist

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blu-ray player.
customer_reviews.text: Great blu-ray player. Have had it for more than two years. Worth every penny. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: CRofMiramar

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: probably the best investment I ever made, If connected to WiFi this device will prompt you to upgrade software one in a while, I would recommend NOT upgrading because it will not play some of your AVI or video file. Kepp it at factory settings and this palyer will perform just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Has

customer_reviews.title: 3D MOVIES FREEZE ALWAYS
customer_reviews.text: I choose this player above the 5500 because of the wireless. However EVERY time we watch a 3D movie on it if freezrs 20- 30 min in. cant skip ahead, cant go to menu. These were Brand NEw disks, MEga mind, shrek, dispicable me, All have the same problem. very frustrating whrn you have kids watching. Other peaopel say just unplug it and reboot. I wasy WHY should I have to do that It jujst freezes 20 min later. this player and all samsum 3D player are Junk
customer_reviews.author: JJJ8800

customer_reviews.title: As advertized  Samsung BD-D6500 3D
customer_reviews.text: Hi I recently purchased the Samsung BD-D6500 3D Blu-ray Disc Player (Black)and I am happy. Samsung makes quality products! Did lot of research on line; paying attention to peoples reviews which help me to decide. Checked out tech specs and found this was perfect for me as I just purchased a Samsung 51 "Plazma 3D smart TV. I am new and not a audio file person. I found main features listed were more than good and I saved ~ 40%. JFK
customer_reviews.author: jonie outdrive

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Blue Ray Player
customer_reviews.text: This product works great and is easy to set up. Wireless works great. It is the second one I have purchased recently, used in different locations.
customer_reviews.author: ALLAN KOBELLAS

customer_reviews.title: dvd player
customer_reviews.text: The samsung dvd player is easy to use.Software upgrades are available and are easy to download from the web via my samsung smart tv.
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: Blueray dvd
customer_reviews.text: Samsung makes quality products, only issue was it comes with older software for internet applications out of the box and takes hours to completely update to the newest code online. When i did call tech support I have to say they were prompt and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Ben-Yishay

customer_reviews.title: Fantasitc Experience
customer_reviews.text: Payment, shipment, and delivery were within all the parameters set by Amazon and the seller. The product is excellent with auto updating as long as it is connected to the internet. Also, if you have a Samsung TV, they work together to provide an excellent viewing experience.
customer_reviews.author: el_blandino

customer_reviews.title: Pile of junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this player last spring. Pros- slim profile Cons- Rarely plays Disney Blurays. Search Samsung Castle disney bluray. Firmware updates make no difference. Absurd external storage port location. Apps are ridiculously slow.
customer_reviews.author: TXGunLover

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good, simple and sharp image. For real digital image you will need digital everything: receiver and hdtv. Wires need to be HDMI for it to really get the effects other wise DTS and other futures won't work. Other than that awesome.
customer_reviews.author: West

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 6500 Blu Ray
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup with this bluray player and ease of use. I like that I can connect to the internet from this bluray player. Good quality pictures are sent to my HDTV from the player. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Huntdogs

customer_reviews.title: PICTURE IS GREAT ONLINE SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: THE WORST PLYER FOR STREAMING NETFLIX...WIFI OR HARD WIRE IT DONT MATTER IT SUCKS!!!!!!DONT BUY IF U LIKE TO STREAM ONLINE..I HAD THIS PLAYER FOR A YEAR NOW AND THE ONLINE GOT SOO BAD THAT IT WONT CONNECT ONLINE NO MORE!!
customer_reviews.author: MAN X

customer_reviews.title: kool and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung Blu-Ray has a sharp look and the quality of dvd's are very nice.You can also go WiFi with it from watching much more movies and TV shows.I love shopping at Amazon.They are accurate with timing. It's a good one! Get it NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Rezwan Khan

customer_reviews.title: best blu ray player i have owned
customer_reviews.text: Great sound superb picture lots of apps plus features that i like for a great low price and a brand new item
customer_reviews.author: csj

customer_reviews.title: Blue Review
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Samsung Blue Ray 3D Smart player to match with my Samsung LCD flat screen TV. They went together well and I had no trouble with installation and was up and running in less that 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This works with my T. V. that is also a samsung and Ihave had no problems with it since I have received it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Honomichl

customer_reviews.title: Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: This worked all right and was better than the LG upgrader we returned to Best Buy. However, the streaming didn't always work. We wanted to use it in a bedroom and it needed to work well wirelessly. We exchanged it for a Roku that works wonderfully for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding item, can't wait to use the 3-D function. It will totally revolutionize how I view movies.
customer_reviews.author: Saints11

customer_reviews.title: D6500 BLU RAY
customer_reviews.text: SEEMS TO WORK WELL , AND SET UP WAS A BREEZE TO MY NEW UN55D7000 SAMSUNG TV VERY SLIM AND LIGHT FITS WELL IN MY EXISTING FURNITURE
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lafauci

customer_reviews.title: Works well, no problems
customer_reviews.text: We own this unit for almost a year I think. Works fine with Samsung TV. No problems. You DO need to work on settings, home theater to be particular. Do run software update.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Shal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I love it! this product is really amazing! very easy to use. im really glad that i brought it! its really worth my money!
customer_reviews.author: Jaddua

customer_reviews.title: Raider747
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Sleek and functional and nice that it has a slot versus a drawer. Just what I was looking for at the right price!
customer_reviews.author: Raider Ramstad

customer_reviews.title: Great blue ray player
customer_reviews.text: Very nice easy to handle great with any Samsung tv the 3D part is Is exceptionally well All-around great buy
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Samsung BD-6500 3D Blu-Ray Player
customer_reviews.text: Ease of setup - automatically accesses menu at first powerup. Brainless to get initial setup completed perfectly by just following the menu. The up-convert function of this player works beautifully. This is a nice unit at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: GlenTurbo

customer_reviews.title: Blu-ray player
customer_reviews.text: set up fast use the netflix with my 1080p projector. the wireless connected no problem. it is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: kimo

customer_reviews.title: Samsung BD-D6500
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with DVD player, it is so simple to work. I have Nexflix and Blockbuster comming thru my DVD player via Wi Fi.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Great 3D Blu-Ray Player!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Blu-Ray Player! It has great features and is very easy to use. 3D movies look great! I really like the Samsung Allshare feature which allows you view or listen to all your movies, pictures and music that you have on your computer through your TV when your computer is connected to the same network as your Blu-Ray Player.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Proano

customer_reviews.title: pretty good so far!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all of the functionality, but it seems to do what it says. Ironically when I turn it on, it takes over the settings of an older samsung tv (not a smart tv) which I find odd, but it is OK. I also wish the DNLP worked a little more user friendly / plug/play. you have to search for things vs. it just 'finding' all of your video in outside sources.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Love te product but when the item was delivered it was delivered in its regular packaging, it was not in another box so when I received it my brother was home and saw it and it was his Christmas present so it kind of ruined the suprise. The seller should put their items in another box when shipping, other than that I received it in a timely matter
customer_reviews.author: LRB

customer_reviews.title: sleek
customer_reviews.text: havent used this much but great product. husband hooked it up easily...again ridiculous that there is a minimum # of words for this review to be posted!
customer_reviews.author: lauraslp

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD PRODUCT, excellent quality, ARRIVED IN THE TIME indicated. GOOD SALESMAN, FULFILLED AND RESPONSIBLE. I LOVED THE QUALITY OF THE IMAGE and sound, in addition to the PERFECT CONDITIONS IN WHICH IT WAS sent, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JULIAN

customer_reviews.title: Great player except
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well, great quality, no major problems but one. The All Share is a farce. It does not work, I called many times, downloaded updates which continues to locks up my computer. It never connects to the player or TV. But the rest of the player is fine. This is a new model so they say I have to wait for an update. Its been well over a month and still no update. How can they put out a product and it don't work and have no update to make it work is beyond me. Very frustrating. Other than this its a great player for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Just spent couple of hours unsuccessfully trying to connect BD-D6500 to home network. First of despite purchasing this BD last week the software is already outdated since January, means no current fixes for the 6 months. That would be fine if it's work, but it doesn't! BD found my network but wasn't able to connect to it in Auto mode. Tryed manual- no good. Called Samsung support. The call taker is just waste of time: reste, turn on and off, unplug/replug etc and then transferred to 2-nd line who suggested to turn off the router wirewall ;-( didn't help either. So it will go back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: alexp

customer_reviews.title: Very Early Review Makes this value Questionable
customer_reviews.text: I have used this item once since installation. Really cannot evaluate Fairly. So I responded only to eliminate further E-Mails SORRY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Hadik
